Name: AuthorizingAgencyReference_Organization
Description: References the authorizing agency, organization, or individual.

Name: AuthorizingAgencyReference_Individual
Description: References the authorizing agency, organization, or individual.

Name: StatementOfAuthorization
Description: Text of the authorization. May be repeated for multiple languages.

Name: LegalMandate
Description: Provide a legal citation to a law authorizing the study/data collection. For example, a legal citation for a law authorizing a country's census.
